entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a set of Blazor authentication components in the Blazor project template #48786
    8.0-rc1
  • Stream Rendering works fine with cli but does full refresh with Visual Studio #48785
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json, mvc #48784
  • Generate schema for custom configuration propertes to be respected by various IDEs for autocompletion. #48783
  • QuickGrid event handling on paging buttons #48776
    Backlog
  • Clarify auth plan for Blazor web project template #48772
    8.0-preview6
  • Split blazor.web.js into dynamically-loadable bundles #48771
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Make SupplyParameterFromQuery cascade like SupplyParameterFromForm #48770
    Backlog
  • Blazor SSR APIs for accessing HttpContext without IHttpContextAccessor #48769
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Integrate with WebAssembly multithreading #48768
    8.0-preview7
  • Move Blazor endpoints source generation into Razor compiler #48767
    8.0-rc1
  • Trigger navigation callbacks in all Blazor hosts #48766
    8.0-preview7
  • Close circuit when there are no remaining interactive Server components #48765
    8.0-preview7
  • Don't break interactive components when their parent static content is updated #48764
    8.0-rc1
  • Start interactive components that were added dynamically #48763
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor SSR progressive enhancement integration with form posts #48762
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor SSR progressive enhancement integration with navigation #48761
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor SSR traditional form post handling #48760
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor forms model binding #48759
    8.0-preview7
  • Unified project template conventions and mitigating accidental inclusion in WebAssembly build #48758
    8.0-preview7
  • Customizing how Auto mode makes its decision #48756
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Improve RenderTreeFrameArrayBuilder pooling #48755
    8.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes #48750
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #48749
  • Allow for SignalR Clients to Handle Unregistered Handlers #48747
  • Debug the ASP.NET Core API project with IIS Express profile, the web page keeps loading. #48774
  • Casing Consistency Between SignalR Clients #48746
  • Blazor DeserializeNoConstructor #48745

Closed

  • Microsoft Edge 622% slower with Blazor websites #48754
  • aspnetcore test failing on mono runtime #48710
    Backlog
  • VS 2022. ASP.NET Core with Angular. IIS Virtual Dir. #48739
  • Broken link in CONTRIBUTING.md #48468
  • [Blazor] Add synchronization context to webassembly when multithreaded runtime is enabled #47888
    8.0-preview6
  • Rename metrics counter names #48536
  • The names of the metrics produced by the new meters do not seem clear #48309
  • Proper discovery of SSR pages/endpoints for Blazor #46980
    8.0-preview6
  • net8.0-browser TFM integration with build/publish/SWA #48757
  • Handle forms with Blazor SSR #46688
    8.0-preview6
  • Identify the code the compiler needs to generate when rendering a component from within a Razor Page/View #46402
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] Mechanism for rendering a "remote" component on to the page. #46704
    8.0-preview6
  • Startup APIs for enabling Server/WebAssembly hosting #46992
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Set component render mode either at the call site or in the component itself #46994
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WebAssembly not caching in browser #48748
  • Kestrel connection metrics - add protocol and TLS info? #47831
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Import “google/api/annotations.proto” was not found or had errors. #48589
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, single_query #48715
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #48716

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ITlsHandshakeFeature.HostName API + misc. improvements in HttpSys calls #48788
    area-runtime
  • Revert SDK update #48787
    area-infrastructure
  • Update milestones for August servicing #48782
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, needs-area-label
  • Implement IHostApplicationBuilder on WebApplicationBuilder #48775
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • Move SignalR connection start telemetry to transport start #48753
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #48777
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.19
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #48779
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.8
  • Update downlevel SiteExtension versions #48781
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Use ephemeral data protection in tests #48743
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview6
  • Add test to helix retry list #48731
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Switch to bootstrap icons #48652
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    area-signalr, area-networking, area-middleware, 8.0-preview6
  • Add TLS and HTTP protocol to kestrel-connection-duration counter #48723
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6
  • Deflake Http2WebSocket tests #48742
    area-networking, 8.0-preview6
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.6.23312.4 #48735
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Add `IRazorComponentsBuilder.AddWebAssemblyComponents()` #48664
    area-blazor
  • add review comment to sb files #48566
    area-infrastructure
  • Unify JSON handling across RDF and RDG #48573
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Proof of concept for extending http logging #48679
    area-runtime
  • NavLink component is active on wrong path potential fix #48627 #48713
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor
  • Fixes #48627 NavLink component is active on wrong path #48718
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Retain DOM nodes during streaming SSR updates #48258
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Add refresh token support to BearerTokenHandler #48595
    area-identity
  • [skip-ci]Add links to video for contribution guidelines #48647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
    blocked, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
